imgui.glfw

Class ImGuiImplGlfw

  • java.lang.Object
    • imgui.glfw.ImGuiImplGlfw

  • public class ImGuiImplGlfw
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a straightforward port of the imgui_impl_glfw.cpp.

    It supports clipboard, gamepad, mouse and keyboard in the same way the original Dear ImGui code does. You can copy-paste this class in your codebase and modify the rendering routine in the way you'd like.

      • mouseButtonCallback

        public void mouseButtonCallback(long windowId,
                                int button,
                                int action,
                                int mods)
        Method to set the GLFWMouseButtonCallback.
        Parameters:
        windowId - pointer to the window
        button - clicked mouse button
        action - click action type
        mods - click modifiers

      • scrollCallback

        public void scrollCallback(long windowId,
                           double xOffset,
                           double yOffset)
        Method to set the GLFWScrollCallback.
        Parameters:
        windowId - pointer to the window
        xOffset - scroll offset by x-axis
        yOffset - scroll offset by y-axis

      • keyCallback

        public void keyCallback(long windowId,
                        int key,
                        int scancode,
                        int action,
                        int mods)
        Method to set the GLFWKeyCallback.
        Parameters:
        windowId - pointer to the window
        key - pressed key
        scancode - key scancode
        action - press action
        mods - press modifiers

      • windowFocusCallback

        public void windowFocusCallback(long windowId,

        Method to set the GLFWWindowFocusCallback.
        Parameters:
        windowId - pointer to the window
        focused - is window focused

        entered - is cursor entered

        Parameters:
        windowId - pointer to the window
        c - pressed char

      • monitorCallback

        public void monitorCallback(long windowId,
                            int event)
        Method to set the GLFWMonitorCallback.
        Parameters:
        windowId - pointer to the window
        event - monitor event type (ignored)

      • init

        public boolean init(long windowId,
                    boolean installCallbacks)
        Method to do an initialization of the ImGuiImplGlfw state. It SHOULD be called before calling the newFrame() method.

        Method takes two arguments, which should be a valid GLFW window pointer and a boolean indicating whether or not to install callbacks.

        Parameters:
        windowId - pointer to the window
        installCallbacks - should window callbacks be installed
        Returns:
        true if everything initialized

      • newFrame

        public void newFrame()
        Updates ImGuiIO and GLFW state.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Method to restore GLFW to it's state prior to calling method init(long, boolean).
